addr: 17 Marylebone Road London, Gt Lon NW1 5LT GB
title: Love Christmas Celebrity Carol Concert
desc: Due to the nature of this beautiful church, unfortunately some seating may have a severely restricted (and in some cases obstructed) view and not all seating in the church is suitable for guests with accessibility requirements. Each section of the church and seating type is clearly marked on the seating plan. All seating on the ground floor is within pews. There is no disabled access to the gallery and upper gallery as they are only serviced by a staircase. Seating in the gallery and upper gallery is within pews or on benches. The upper gallery is steep and as such is not recommended for people who suffer from a fear of heights. Please review our   before purchasing your tickets. If you are a wheelchair user and would like to book tickets please contact the Events Team by calling: 0203 033 1725.
